meta.content: K12 is the trusted provider of online learning for many virtual public schools, as well as homeschooling. K12's public schools feature rigorous online curriculum with hands-on materials. Take charge of your child’s education with K12.

div.class: image-container efao_text lg-mt-50 md-mt-25 sm-mt-20 xs-mt-0 lg-mb-25 md-mb-25 sm-mb-15 xs-mb-15 left-align

div.p: We are K12, providing families an online option for a high-quality, personalized education experience. With innovative technology, inspiring teachers, and a dynamic, interactive curriculum, students can thrive, find their passion, and learn at the pace that's right for them. Over one million students have chosen K12-powered schools. Will you join us?

h2.b:
Enrollment is Open for the 2020–2021 School Year.
Find School Options for Your family

div.p: K12 online education is offered in state-authorized schools. Enter your zip code or state to see schools available in your area.

div.h2: Support for Schools and Families Affected by Coronavirus
div.p: Nate Davis, K12’s CEO and Chairman of the Board of Directors, affirms K12's commitment to helping those in need. "Here at K12, we want people to know that if they want to make online and blended learning a part of their crisis response planning, we are prepared to quickly lend a helping hand now and in the future."

p.b: And to help support learning continuity, we're offering several K12-powered solutions for free, now through June 30, 2020.

div.p: Call us at 855.593.7280 for more information.

div.h2: Support for Schools and Families Affected by Coronavirus
div.p: Nate Davis, K12’s CEO and Chairman of the Board of Directors, affirms K12's commitment to helping those in need. "Here at K12, we want people to know that if they want to make online and blended learning a part of their crisis response planning, we are prepared to quickly lend a helping hand now and in the future."
And to help support learning continuity, we're offering several K12-powered solutions tuition-free now through June 30, 2020.
Call us at 855.593.7280 for details.

K12 offers options to fit your student’s needs and the needs of your family. Between tuition-free public school from kindergarten through 12th grade, a new kind of high school with career-focused pathways, and fee-based private schools and independent courses, there is something for any ONE at K12.

Tuition-free, K12-powered public schools feature rigorous online curriculum with hands-on materials delivered to your door.* Dedicated, state-certified teachers provide instruction and support for students in grades K–12.

div.class: col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 lg-pt-30 md-pt-30 sm-pt-10 xs-pt-10
button-container align-center hidden-lg hidden-md hidden-sm MT-25
lg-mt-40 lg-pb-30 md-mt-40 md-pb-30 sm-mt-40 sm-pb-30 xs-mt-40 xs-pb-30 text-container

div.p: Destinations Career Academy, a new kind of high school, puts students on a path toward success in today’s high-demand career fields** such as information technology and health care, all while completing traditional high school requirements. Students meet the future college-ready, career-ready, or ready for both with Destinations. Tuition-free and tuition-based options available.

a.title: www.destinationacademy.com - opens in a new window

div.class: button-container align-center MT-25 hidden-lg hidden-md hidden-sm
lg-mt-40 lg-pb-0 md-mt-40 md-pb-0 sm-mt-40 sm-pb-0 xs-mt-40 xs-pb-0 text-container

div.p: Our three fully accredited, tuition-based, online private schools offer various levels of flexibility, personalized learning, and teacher support for students in grades K–12.

div.data-title: Student sitting in front of a computer
div.data-alt: Smiling high school student sitting in front of a computer

div.class: button-container align-center hidden-lg hidden-md hidden-sm MT-25
lg-mt-50 lg-pb-10 md-mt-50 md-pb-10 sm-mt-40 sm-pb-0 xs-mt-40 xs-pb-0 text-container

div.p: K12’s flexible courses can supplement your homeschool curriculum or help your student catch up, get ahead, or explore an interest. Fee-based options available for grades K–12. Simply buy what you need, or what you want.

div.class: button-container align-center hidden-lg hidden-md hidden-sm MT-25 MB-25

p.i: *Course materials vary by course and school. Please check with your school about offline course materials.
**Opportunities vary by school; please check with your school counselor.

p.span: What does online schooling look like? That's up to the student, because personalized learning is just that—personal. Take a look at a typical day in the lives of our students.

div.h2: We're Expanding our Career-Readiness Training Beyond High School
div.p: K12 has teamed with Galvanize, one of the country’s top providers of workforce training in software engineering and data science, to help you take the next step toward a lucrative high-tech career. Whether you are just out of high school or want to advance your career, you can build your high-tech skills by attending full-time or part-time immersive bootcamps—online or at one of eight campuses across the country. Galvanize graduates earn, on average, annual base salaries of $90,000 and above.

div.h2: We're Expanding our Career-Readiness Training Beyond High School
div.p: K12 has teamed with Galvanize, one of the country’s top providers of workforce training in software engineering and data science, to help you take the next step toward a lucrative high-tech career. Whether you are just out of high school or want to advance your career, you can build your high-tech skills by attending full-time or part-time immersive bootcamps—online or at one of eight campuses across the country. Galvanize graduates earn, on average, annual base salaries of $90,000 and above.

K12 programs teach to and embrace your child's unique brilliance. Whether an athlete, advanced learner, homeschooler, military kid, career or college-bound—or anything in between—your child can feel at home in our growing community of students.
Advanced Learner
We offer advanced learning opportunities from kindergarten to high school

div.data-alt: Father and son work on homework together

div.p: Personalized Learning
Personalized learning lets families like yours be involved in their child's education.
Career Readiness Education
Our CRE schools give students a head start on career goals and college aspirations.

div.data-alt: Military Mom lying on the floor with two daughters

div.p: Military Families
Military families can count on the support, consistency and quality of a K12 education.
Homeschool
Homeschooling and online public schooling at home are different! We offer options for both.
STEM
Our STEM-related courses aim to teach teamwork, creativity, and problem-solving skills.
K12-powered schools have transformed learning for countless students. Read on to discover their amazing stories.
K12-powered schools have transformed learning for countless students. Read on to discover their amazing stories.

div.h2: Get Set to Connect with Your Future!
div.p: Imagine colleges and companies searching for you. With Tallo, students can create a profile to connect with college, scholarship, internship, and career opportunities—all in one place. Get ready to stand out and let your future come find you!

div.h2: Get Set to Connect with Your Future!
div.p: Imagine colleges and companies searching for you. With Tallo, students can create a profile to connect with college, scholarship, internship, and career opportunities—all in one place. Get ready to stand out and let your future come find you!

div.h2: WE'RE HERE TO ANSWER YOUR QUESTIONS.
div.p: Call us at 866.968.7512, chat, or fill out this form for more information.
What grades are you interested in?

div.p: By providing this information, you agree to receive calls/texts from a K12 or school representative or a device that will autodial the number provided. Message and data rates may apply.
with an online consultant
We're here to help

div.h5: Technical Support for Computers & Online School Support for Approved Families

div.p: Families do not pay tuition for a student to attend an online public school. Common household items and office supplies like printer ink and paper are not provided. Our enrollment consultants can help address your technological and computer questions and needs.
